ca.ualberta.cs.routinekeen.Controllers

Class HabitListController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.routinekeen.Controllers.HabitListController

  • public class HabitListController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller used to access and modify Habits in the current user's HabitList
    See Also:
    IOManager, HabitList

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void addHabit(Habit habit)
      Adds the provided habit to the current user's HabitList
      static HabitList getHabitList()
      Returns a list of all habits belonging to the current user.
      static HabitList getTodaysHabits()
      Returns a list of all habits belonging to the current user that are scheduled for the current day of the week.
      static void saveHabitList()
      Saves changed to the user's HabitList.
      static void updateHabit(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String reason, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> schedDays, int position)
      Updates the habit edited and saves it to the network and local storage

    • Method Detail

      • getHabitList

        public static HabitList getHabitList()
        Returns a list of all habits belonging to the current user.
        Returns:
        A HabitList containing all the user's habits
        See Also:
        HabitList

      • getTodaysHabits

        public static HabitList getTodaysHabits()
        Returns a list of all habits belonging to the current user that are scheduled for the current day of the week.
        Returns:
        A HabitList containing today's habits
        See Also:
        HabitList

      • addHabit

        public static void addHabit(Habit habit)
        Adds the provided habit to the current user's HabitList
        Parameters:
        habit - The Habit to be added
        See Also:
        Habit, HabitList

      • updateHabit

        public static void updateHabit(java.lang.String title,
                               java.lang.String reason,
                               java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> schedDays,
                               int position)
        Updates the habit edited and saves it to the network and local storage
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the updated/unchanged habit
        reason - The reason for the updated/unchanged habit
        schedDays - The scheduled days for the updated/unchanged habit
        position - The position of the habit within the habit list

      • saveHabitList

        public static void saveHabitList()
        Saves changed to the user's HabitList. Called after additions, deletions, or edits are made to the HabitList
        See Also:
        IOManager, HabitList
